This attempts to bitcast G&#95;EXTRACT&#95;SUBVECTOR to CastTy.

&lt;vscale x 8 x i1&gt; = G&#95;EXTRACT&#95;SUBVECTOR &lt;vscale x 16 x i1&gt;, N

===&gt;

&lt;vscale x 2 x i1&gt; = G&#95;BITCAST &lt;vscale x 16 x i1&gt; &lt;vscale x 1 x i8&gt; = G&#95;EXTRACT&#95;SUBVECTOR &lt;vscale x 2 x i1&gt;, N / 8 &lt;vscale x 8 x i1&gt; = G&#95;BITCAST &lt;vscale x 1 x i8&gt;

### bitcastExtractVectorElt() {#ac50dd9fe6220347f8306e3694a8129cb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LegalizerHelper::LegalizeResult LegalizerHelper::bitcastExtractVectorElt (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, unsigned TypeIdx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> CastTy)</>}>
Perform Bitcast legalize action on G&#95;EXTRACT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT.

Perform a G&#95;EXTRACT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT in a different sized vector element.

If this is casting to a vector with a smaller element size, perform multiple element extracts and merge the results. If this is coercing to a vector with larger elements, index the bitcasted vector and extract the target element with bit operations. This is intended to force the indexing in the native register size for architectures that can dynamically index the register file.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-h/#l00381">381</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-h">LegalizerHelper.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-cpp/#l03559">3559</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-cpp">LegalizerHelper.cpp</a>.

Perform Bitcast legalize action on G&#95;INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT.

Perform a G&#95;INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT in a different sized vector element.

If this is increasing the element size, perform the indexing in the target element type, and use bit operations to insert at the element position. This is intended for architectures that can dynamically index the register file and want to force indexing in the native register size.

### fewerElementsVectorMultiEltType() {#a8f6d92157833612e9b4cd0085e181b7e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LegalizerHelper::LegalizeResult LegalizerHelper::fewerElementsVectorMultiEltType (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericmachineinstr">GenericMachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, unsigned NumElts, std::initializer&#95;list&lt; unsigned &gt; NonVecOpIndices=&#123;&#125;)</>}>
Handles most opcodes.

Split <code>MI</code> into same instruction on sub-vectors or scalars with <code>NumElts</code> elements (1 for scalar). Supports uneven splits: there can be leftover sub-vector with fewer then <code>NumElts</code> or a leftover scalar. To avoid this use moreElements first and set MI number of elements to multiple of <code>NumElts</code>. Non-vector operands that should be used on all sub-instructions without split are listed in <code>NonVecOpIndices</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-h/#l00320">320</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-h">LegalizerHelper.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-cpp/#l04860">4860</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-cpp">LegalizerHelper.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### legalizeInstrStep() {#af8ec769be431aa1296a7c786eb456f53}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LegalizerHelper::LegalizeResult LegalizerHelper::legalizeInstrStep (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lostdebuglocobserver">LostDebugLocObserver</a> &amp; LocObserver)</>}>
Replace <code>MI</code> by a sequence of legal instructions that can implement the same operation.

Note that this means <code>MI</code> may be deleted, so any iterator steps should be performed before calling this function. <code>Helper</code> should be initialized to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> containing <code>MI</code>.

Considered as an opaque blob, the legal code will use and define the same registers as <code>MI</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-h/#l00095">95</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-h">LegalizerHelper.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-cpp/#l00119">119</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-cpp">LegalizerHelper.cpp</a>.

### buildLCMMergePieces() {#abe48c77dc4845bfcf8d3caade230465d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLT LegalizerHelper::buildLCMMergePieces (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> DstTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> NarrowTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> GCDTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; &amp; VRegs, unsigned PadStrategy=TargetOpcode::G&#95;ANYEXT)</>}>
Produce a merge of values in <code>VRegs</code> to define <code>DstReg</code>.

Perform a merge from the least common multiple type, and convert as appropriate to <code>DstReg</code>.

<code>VRegs</code> should each have type <code>GCDTy</code>. This type should be greatest common divisor type of <code>DstReg</code>, <code>NarrowTy</code>, and an undetermined source type.

<code>NarrowTy</code> is the desired result merge source type. If the source value needs to be widened to evenly cover <code>DstReg</code>, inserts high bits corresponding to the extension opcode <code>PadStrategy</code>.

<code>VRegs</code> will be cleared, and the result <code>NarrowTy</code> register pieces will replace it. Returns The complete LCMTy that <code>VRegs</code> will cover when merged.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-h/#l00237">237</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-h">LegalizerHelper.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-cpp/#l00258">258</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizerhelper-cpp">LegalizerHelper.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

The elements of <code>Parts</code> will be the greatest common divisor type of <code>DstTy</code>, <code>NarrowTy</code> and the type of <code>SrcReg</code>. This will compute and return the GCD type.

### insertParts() {#aa82481b7d6e8565de31bfc00ab3101d6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LegalizerHelper::insertParts (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> DstReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> ResultTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> PartTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; PartRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> LeftoverTy=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; LeftoverRegs=&#123;&#125;)</>}>
Helper function to build a wide generic register <code>DstReg</code> of type <code>RegTy</code> from smaller parts.

This will produce a G&#95;MERGE&#95;VALUES, G&#95;BUILD&#95;VECTOR, G&#95;CONCAT&#95;VECTORS, or sequence of G&#95;INSERT as appropriate for the types.

<code>PartRegs</code> must be registers of type <code>PartTy</code>.

If <code>ResultTy</code> does not evenly break into <code>PartTy</code> sized pieces, the remainder must be specified with <code>LeftoverRegs</code> of type <code>LeftoverTy</code>.
